tag.description: Renders a datePicker for a input
tag.name: datePicker

attribute.description: Indicates the component that triggers the date picker
attribute.name: attachTo

attribute.description: Indicates the component selector that triggers the date picker
attribute.name: attachToSelector

attribute.description: Indicates the minimum day for date choice
attribute.name: min

attribute.description: Indicates the maximum day for date choice
attribute.name: max

tag.example: <html:input name="input1" placeHolder="Date birth" /> <html:datePicker attachTo="input1" min="0" max="3"/>
